actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the "Laurel River Lake" on the Laurel River, Ky., shall hereafter be known as the John Sherman Cooper Lake and that the dam forming such lake shall hereafter be referred to as the John Sherman Cooper Dam.

summary.text: Provides that the lake referred to as "Laurel River Lake" on the Laurel River, Kentucky, shall hereafter be known as the "John Sherman Cooper Lake," and that the dam forming such lake shall hereafter be referred to as the "John Sherman Cooper Dam."

titles.title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the "Laurel River Lake" on the Laurel River, Ky., shall hereafter be known as the John Sherman Cooper Lake and that the dam forming such lake shall hereafter be referred to as the John Sherman Cooper Dam.
